page.title: 02General Description of Area
page.content: middle class, middle management group buying their houses. This part of the village population is somewhat fluid as promotion or redundancy often means a change of residence. There is a good proportion of retired people also.There are about half a dozen truly old village families left. To the N & NE of the village there are arable farms. People who live and work in the village do so on the land, at the P.O. at the builders(3) and the garage. The village is well within reach of other towns (eg Thetford,Stowmarket) The land is a thorough mixture of heavy and light soil. Great Barton is pleasantly rural, with easy access to several larger towns (eg Cambridge, Norwich) and one and a half hours by road to London on the M11.
